subject: Running
Massage
Steroids
Testosterone
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: After Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic gold medalist in the 100-meter dash, blamed his massage therapist for a failed drug test, the spotlight landed on them.
snippet: After Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic gold medalist in the 100-meter dash, blamed his massage therapist for a failed drug test, the spotlight landed on them.
